scripts.release: turbo --filter "./packages/*" build && bumpp && pnpm -r publish --access public --no-git-checks
scripts.release:canary: turbo --filter "./packages/*" build && bumpp && pnpm -r publish --access public --tag canary --no-git-checks
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "Update on $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" && git push origin main
scripts.pull: git fetch upstream && git merge -X ours --no-commit upstream/main && git status --porcelain | grep -v '^?' | cut -c4- | xargs -r git checkout upstream/main -- && git commit -m 'Update from upstream' && git push origin main
scripts.diff: git fetch upstream && git diff upstream/main...main --name-status
scripts.diff:upstream: git fetch upstream && git diff $(git merge-base upstream/main main)..upstream/main -- $(git ls-files)
scripts.diff:files: git fetch upstream && git diff upstream/main --name-only
scripts.diff:new: git fetch upstream && git diff --name-only --diff-filter=A $(git merge-base upstream/main main)..upstream/main
